statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // empty'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); status="$model | $cwd"; [ -n "$style" ] && status="$status | Style: $style"; [ -n "$remaining" ] && status="$status | Context: $remaining% remaining"; echo "$status"
